attributes.action: Place a windfall tax on the profits of all banks operating in the UK, as the current crisis has been caused by their greed and irresponsibility
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The world's banks are responsible for the current economic mess, their greed causing irresponsible lending. They are now exacerbating the problems by not lending money to anyone. They make vast profits and will continue to do so in spite of the fact everyone else is suffering. So tax them a one off 40% of their profits last year as punishment.
